please know that removal of counterfeits is not a benefit of brand registry. brand registry’s main benefits are the ability of the brand owner to control the listing’s presentation (other sellers cannot make modifications to the listing) and a the ability to create more robust listings ...

t: What do Amazon mean by Brand owner?
s: So, assuming Amazon have contacted anyone, they can only have messaged the original listing creator - which is just plain stupid as they are not the Brand owner or the owner of the GTIN and they are not even selling the product anymore (I know this as a fact).
